snippet: Jurors at Aaron Hernandez's upcoming double murder trial shouldn't hear about his tattoos or text messages sent to his sports agent, attorneys for former New England Patriots player told a judge Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Jurors at Aaron Hernandez's upcoming double murder trial shouldn't hear about his tattoos or text messages sent to his sports agent, attorneys for former New England Patriots player told a judge Tuesday.

headline.main: Hernandez Attorneys Seek Dismissal of Tattoo, Text Evidence
headline.print_headline: Hernandez Attorneys Seek Dismissal of Tattoo, Text Evidence
